snippet.title: The Time I Have Left - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: In 6 hours you will be dead…Even so, is there anything you would like to do before the end? Check out the latest The Time I Have Left trailer to see gameplay, enemies, areas you can explore, and more from this upcoming time-drive escape adventure RPG. The Time I Have Left follows the story of Aline, a woman with only six hours of life remaining, as she searches for a way out of a desolate underground city. Explore the seemingly deserted complex and uncover the secrets of the mysterious condition that has marked Aline for certain death, all while fighting grotesque visions in a turn-based combat system with an active twist. The Time I Have Left will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.
